title: Dell security advisory (AV25-325)
description: Between June 2 and 8, 2025, Dell published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Dell SD-WAN EDGE610/610-LTE  versions prior to 2.6
Dell SD-WAN EDGE620/640/680  versions prior to 2.6
Dell SmartFabric Manager  versions prior to 1.3.0
PowerSwitch E3200-ON Series  versions prior to 3.57.5.1-5
PowerSwitch N2200 Series  versions prior to 3.45.5.1-31
PowerSwitch N3200-ON Series  versions prior to 45.5.1-31
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
